solution_line_template: The clown is holding {num_dozen} x {dozen} = <<{num_dozen}*{dozen}={total_balloons}>>{total_balloons} balloons.
This many children buy a balloon: {num_boys} + {num_girls} = <<{num_boys}+{num_girls}={total_kids}>>{total_kids} kids.
After the children buy the balloons, the clown is holding this many in his hand {total_balloons} - {total_kids} = <<{total_balloons}-{total_kids}={balloons_left}>>{balloons_left} balloons.
